column2: In part 3 of this quest, you'll learn to texture and light the low-poly well to make it really pop!

Hey, {{user_name}}, welcome back to Blender! I hope you're ready to start texturing your well! Don't forget that a USB mouse with 2 buttons and a scroll wheel is very helpful for using Blender. I strongly recommend it.
The easiest way to follow along with these tutorials is to adjust your windows so that you can see both Blender and the video.
Have fun! Remember, you can always restart this activity if you need to see the tips or link.
